contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Steenwijk, Overijssel, Netherlands |settlement_type = City |image_map = |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = Overijssel |subdivision_type2 = Municipality |subdivision_name2 = [[Steenwijkerland]] |population = 17.138 |population_as_of = 1 January 2007 |image_shield = Steenwijk wapen.svg |dialling_code = 0521 |postal_code = |latNS = N |longEW = E |latd = 52 |latm = 47 |lats = 20 |longd = 6 |longm = 7 |longs = 36 |image_skyline = Steenwijk Kleirondeel.JPG |image_caption = Bastion in the fortifications around the old city }} '''Steenwijk''' is a [[city#Netherlands|city]] in the [[Netherlands|Dutch]] province of [[Overijssel]]. It is located in the municipality of [[Steenwijkerland]]. It is the largest town of the municipality. Steenwijk received [[City rights in the Netherlands|city rights]] in 1327. In the [[Eighty Years' War]] (1568â€“1648) it was conquered by the Spaniards in 1581, but regained by the Dutch in 1592. Steenwijk was a separate municipality until 2001, when it merged with [[Brederwiede]] and [[IJsselham]]. The new municipality was first named "Steenwijk", but was renamed in 2003 to "Steenwijkerland".<ref>{{Repertorium Nederlandse Gemeenten}}</ref> ==Transport== Railway Station: [[Steenwijk railway station|Steenwijk]] ==Gallery== <gallery> File:Steenwijk_centrum_van_boven.jpg|View on the city centre from the St Clemens tower. File:Omwalling_Steenwijk.jpg|[[Fortifications]] with gate around the old city of Steenwijk. File:Toegang Rams Woerthe Steenwijk.jpg|[[Art Nouveau]] villa ''Rams Woerthe''. </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{commons cat|Steenwijk}} *{{Kuyper|Steenwijk|ov|steenwijk}} Map of the former municipality, around 1868. {{Coord|52|47|N|6|07|E|region:NL_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Cities in the Netherlands]] [[Category:Populated places in Overijssel]] [[Category:Former municipalities of Overijssel]] [[Category:Steenwijkerland]] {{Overijssel-geo-stub}}
